column5: I haven't been to the grand in many years. I used to go to the river under a huge bridge for carp and cats. All I remember is that I have to go 401 west. Can someone PM me if they think they know the place? I think the bridge is green. My dad used to take me there as a kid.  Thanks in advance,  Daniel

If it's this green bridge keep heading west on the 401. If you run into a surly, gun toting civil servent asking "What is the nature of your visit?", back up about half a mile.    Sorry, I couldn't resist. -Brian
